project.name: Cpp-lib Maven archetype
project.description:
-------------------------------------------------------- Cpp-exe Maven archetype --------------------------------------------------------
Archetype to generate the basic structure of a simple project in language c++. Example of use: This command generates the test-project project:
mvn archetype:generate \ -DarchetypeGroupId=org.gjs.maven.archetypes \ -DarchetypeArtifactId=gjs-cpp-exe-archetype \ -DarchetypeVersion=1.0.0-SNAPSHOT \ -DshortName=test-project \ -DgroupId=org.gjs.test \ -DartifactId=test-project \ -Dpackage=org.gjs.test \ -Dversion=1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
==================================================================================== Archetype Parameters:
* shortName: Name of the project. Always lowercase. Allows two words separated by a hyphen.
* groupId: The group of the project artifact.
* artifactId: The name of the project artifact. Default is cpp-lib. Not required.
* package: The project packaging of the sourc code. Default is org.gjs.maven.archetypes. Not required.
* version: The project version. Default is 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT. Not required.
====================================================================================
